parameters.name: session_id
parameters.description: Partner ID is assigned upon registration to successfully identify both sides

parameters.name: access_token
parameters.description: The token for API system; refers to identity pure parameter to identify requests

parameters.name: sign
parameters.description: Signature encryption (Certificate as shown in pic), consists of: app_key + session_id + access_token + app_secret

response_fields.name: text
response_fields.description: Image text line by line data; Empty is no error happened

response_fields.name: timestamp
response_fields.description: Image scan results line by line data

response_fields.name: file_size
response_fields.description: The time of the data in the recording log on current server, unit: sec, 1 day share recording will only keep updated data in the previous 100 parameters

response_fields.name: file_id
response_fields.description: Request unique identifier for an error

response_fields.name: status
response_fields.description: Name of the level in your language

response_fields.name: context
response_fields.description: The time right now representing the context unit of the text

response_fields.name: content_pos
response_fields.description: The vertical part of the face in the being processed image; point value range: 0.0-1.0

response_fields.name: original_pos
response_fields.description: The original part of the text in the being processed image
